document_data.mainbody:
ychaki was an edible herb and a potent spice.
The nychaki was only found in Tymanther,As most of the lands of Tymanther were in fact portions of Laerakond, a continent of Abeir, that had exchanged parts with the native soil during the Spellplague.
The nychaki was used in Thymari dishes, the most popular among them being the t√ºrkhaari. The nychakis resin, named talsh, was a potent spice.
